instructions: 直走經過右手邊的Abstract Group、Vicon，約 2 個攤位。
目的地就在前方的 Defined.ai。

companies.name: Defined.ai
companies.description: Defined.ai is a leading provider of ethical AI data, offering a marketplace for high-quality, ethically sourced training datasets and custom data services. The company enables organizations to accelerate AI development with secure, bias-free data, and partners with major tech companies for advanced AI solutions.
